question: Why am I not able to access my account on Pennie?
text:
Why am I not able to access my account on Pennie?  
          
        
Pennie is currently undergoing a brief period of 
planned maintenance 
to implement the enhanced financial assistance available under the American Rescue Plan. As a result, you will not be able to access your Pennie account at this time. Starting Monday, June 7
th 
you can log-in to your account and see any additional savings you may qualify for automatically applied to your account.
If you have additional questions, the Pennie contact center is open Monday through Friday, 8am-6pm at
1-844-844-8040. You can also head to pennie.com for more information about the American Rescue Plan, and how it might impact you and your family.
Note: Pennie contact center representatives will not be able to make account changes or updates during this maintenance period. If you need assistance making account changes Pennie representatives will be able to make these changes on June 7
th
.

ALSO SEE
I need to submit documents to verify information in my application. Why cant I upload documents to my account?
I received a communication from Pennie indicating I needed to make changes to my account. Why cant I access my account?
